column4: Hello, I have a problems with my sound system, the computer basickly says that there isn't one. and says it might be because it's missing packages or thet it's a permission error, bit it' cant be that since im the admin.
Run "alsamixer" to ensure that it is not muted and set all bars to high (use m to toggle mute/unmute)
Well, run it and see if it say anything or if it's not installed.  I don't know about Pulse.  Sorry. :<
